description: The vpl fantasy cricket gaming platform is free and supported on Android (versions 5.1 and above) and iOS devices. Play now on vpl & have an unparalleled fantasy sports experience. Here are the steps to download the best fantasy sports app on your phone.

content: Go to your browser and set https://vpl.live in your URL box.
Click on the 'Download the vpl App' banner.
On the next screen, you will get a pop-up that reads, This type of file can harm your device. Do you want to keep vpl-pro-v117.apk anyway? Select OK.
Downloading the vpl app is 100% safe, and it will not harm your device in any manner.
Once you download the app, click on the Open button and subsequently the Install button.The application will be installed on your android device.
Once the app is installed, click on the Open button
To sign up for the app, you will need to enter your registered number.
Once you do that, a dialog box will appear, stating, "My age is 18 years or older, and I am not playing from the following states - Assam, Nagaland, Orissa, Sikkim, Telangana, and Andhra Pradesh."
If you agree with the terms and conditions, click the 'I agree' button.
You will then receive a 6-digit OTP via SMS on your registered mobile number
Enter the correct 6 - digit OTP, which takes you to the landing page to choose the fantasy cricket option.

data.header: How to Play Fantasy Cricket on the vpl app?

description: vpl is one of the finest fantasy cricket apps in India that provides a clean user interface and seamless gaming experience. It is easy, slick, and anyone with their skills and knowledge of cricket can win big. With a host of T20 leagues like the Indian Premier League, domestic and international matches on, you have the option of building multiple fantasy cricket teams for each cricket match and win cash prizes.

Once the vpl app is downloaded on your device , click on the fantasy cricket option. This takes you to the vpl fantasy cricket match page, which has the schedule of all the upcoming cricket matches from across the globe.

Under the "Upcoming Matches" section, choose any match that you want to play. Once you click on a particular fantasy cricket game, you will be redirected to a page where you can see the prize pool and the relevant entry fees for various fantasy games. You can participate in several contests such as Grand League (Contests with 100+ slots) and Small League (Contests with 2-100 slots). There are various Head to Head contests where you can play fantasy cricket match amongst your friends' limited number.

You are allowed to create multiple teams for a single cricket match, which varies per the contest category. Your probability of winning will increase manifold if you put out more teams in a given contest.

If you are playing a fantasy cricket match for the first time, there are free contests in-place where you can get a feel of how the new fantasy cricket app works. Once you get in the groove, you can go ahead and play fantasy cricket match contests and win real money.

At vpl, we have also gone a step further in ensuring our users get all the information about the relevant cricket matches on one platform. Through our dedicated blog, you can get the best fantasy cricket match tips, match information, pitch analysis, ground details, and expert opinion on whom to select for the upcoming games.

vpl is one of the finest fantasy cricket apps in India that provides a clean user interface and seamless gaming experience. It is easy, slick, and anyone with their skills and knowledge of cricket can win big.

If you are playing cash contests, a good way to move forward before building your fantasy side is to add some money into your vpl app wallet for a smoother process. To do that, click on the wallet icon on the top right corner of the page. You will have a cash balance of INR 20, which is given to you as a sign-up bonus by vpl app. To add more cash, go to the “Add Cash” button and enter the amount you wish to add.

Once done, click on the “Proceed to Add Cash'' button, following which you will be redirected to the payment gateway page. There is no cap on the amount you can add to your vpl fantasy cricket app wallet. You can covplete the transaction using your Paytm or Amazon Pay wallet, UPI, or via Net Banking. You can also add cash into your vpl wallet through a debit or credit card.
You need not worry about losing your money as all payments made on the vpl app are 100% safe & secure.
The higher the amount you add, the chances of you winning a scratch card increases. You can view all the scratch cards, coupons earned, and cash balance on the Wallet page.

If you are playing cash contests, a good way to move forward before building your fantasy side is to add some money into your vpl app wallet for a smoother process. To do that, click on the wallet icon on the top right corner of the page.

data.header: How to make your fantasy dream team on vpl Fantasy Cricket App?

description: While there are different match contests to be played and various prize pools to be won in fantasy cricket on vpl, the basic rules remain the same, be it a T20 fixture, ODI, or Test match. Once you click on a given match on the vpl app, the entire pool of fantasy gamers taking part in the game opens up their trade order. Wicket-keepers, followed by batsmen, all-rounders, and finally the bowlers.

To covplete your fantasy sports 11 for a match, you have to select between 1-4 wicket-keepers, 3-6 batsmen, 1-4 all-rounders, and 3-6 bowlers. This combination should be based on pitch conditions, the two teams playing, venue details, and the players involved.

Each user will be assigned set credits based on their stature and current form. These credits might fluctuate on a match by match basis. You will be given a total of 100 credits to make a fantasy cricket team, from which you have to select a fantasy 11 consisting of players from both the teams taking part in the match. The credits counter will be running on the right side of your screen and will keep reducing as you pick the fantasy players. You can select a maximum of 7 players from one particular team.

Remember, you can't fill your fantasy playing 11 team with just the big-ticket players. There has to be a right balance of experience and youth in-keeping with the conditions where the particular match is being held.

Once you have finished choosing the best 11 players in your team from the two sides, click on the Next button. You will then be asked to select a captain and vice captain, which is a critical step as whomever you choose will go a long way in ultimately deciding the fate of your fantasy dream team. The captain that you select gets 2x the points while the vice captain gets 1.5x the points.
Tip: Do thorough research while selecting the captain and vice captain for a match. Select in-form players or players who can earn points in all departments.

Once you have finished selecting the captain and vice captain of your fantasy playing 11 team, click on the "Save Team button" and subsequently the "Register Team" button, and you are good to go. You can make as many changes to your fantasy 11 till the first ball of the match has been delivered. So, it is a good idea to keep a lookout for the toss and remove any players from your team who are not part of the fixture.

While there are different match contests to be played and various prize pools to be won in fantasy cricket on vpl, the basic rules remain the same, be it a T20 fixture, ODI, or Test match. Once you click on a given match on the vpl app, the entire pool of fantasy gamers taking part in the game opens up their trade order. Wicket-keepers, followed by batsmen, all-rounders, and finally the bowlers.

data.header: Fantasy Cricket features and app screen guide

description: Here is a look at some of the main features of the vpl fantasy cricket app that will help you understand the app's look and feel.

Under forthcoming matches, you can find a schedule of all the games that will be played in the coming days. You can plan your calendar accordingly and start building your fantasy side well in advance.

After selecting a particular match in the Upcoming Matches section, you will find an area where all the contests are listed. If you are at an advanced stage, you can play fantasy cricket match contests. For beginners, there is a free practice contest where you can create teams and get to know the app before you delve into the cash contests.

There is also a private contest tab under the matches section where you can either host your contest and invite your friends and family to play or join a contest that has been created by your friends via the invite code.

On this page, you can look at all the matches you have already created a team for. If the game has not started yet, you can see the game under the Upcoming tab. You can still make any last-minute changes to your fantasy team here.
Under the Live tab, you can look at the scores and the performances of the players you have picked.
Under the results tab, you can view past matches that you took part in.

data.header: Benefits of playing Fantasy Cricket Games on vpl app

description: As we mentioned earlier, there is no shortage of fantasy cricket game apps in India. Still, its easy-to-use interface and ever-evolving innovations make vpl one of the best fantasy cricket apps going around. The most significant and most important benefit of playing fantasy cricket on vpl is that it is entirely safe and secure. All transactions happen in real-time, which means you can instantly withdraw your earnings into your bank account. Here are some of the other benefits of playing fantasy cricket on vpl.

content: Detailed pre-match predictions and analysis: In any field, proper research about the subject becomes vital, and fantasy cricket is no different. How the surface where the match is being played will behave, who are the players that can do well, injury updates, probable XIs - we have everything covered, every time! Just head over to our blog, where you will find relevant news and updates along with analysis for each match in detail.

A place for Rookies and Experienced Players: Is it your first time playing fantasy cricket, or are you a seasoned campaigner who knows the trade's ins and outs and are now looking to win big? The vpl fantasy app is a one-stop destination for both such players. Beginners can join the free practice contests in a bid to get accustomed to the app before moving on to the cash contests. On the other hand, the experienced players can straightaway deposit a nominal sum and start playing the various leagues on the vpl fantasy cricket app.

Rewards galore: There are many games on the vpl app that give you an instant entry fee back. Suppose you enter such matches and join a league, after investing money. In that case, vpl will deposit a certain percentage of the entry fee back into your wallet. Apart from this, you get rewards for referrals and regular scratch cards, coupons, and offers.

Why shouldn't you show-off when you are good at something?: When you know something in abundance, you should be able to show-off, and at vpl, you can earn bragging right over your friends. There are various head to head contests on the vpl fantasy cricket app where you can play with your friends and gain the upper hand amongst your peers.

data.header: FAQs related to Top Fantasy Cricket App

content.name: What are some tips and tricks to win more cash prizes on the vpl app?
description: While playing fantasy cricket, some basic rules need to be remembered that will increase your point earning capacity. They are :

Keep a look out for the toss before the start of a game. Remember that if a player in your fantasy team does not make the playing XI for his side in the real game, you will not get any points from the player for that match in your fantasy team. You are, then, effectively playing with just ten players, and you can bid your chances of winning goodbye. On vpl, you can change your fantasy teams till the first ball is bowled, which gives you avple time to check the toss, the final squads and the list of injuries before finalizing the team.

Keep a track on injuries. Often, a cricketer who bats and bowls or keeps wickets might have an injury and can only take the field in one role. For exavple, Andre Russell often does not bowl in matches because of his nagging knee injury. Keep a track of the history of injuries, and whether the player you have selected is the best option.

Picking top order battsmen in the side is a good idea. It is a fact that players who bat in the top four have the maximum impact in a game. They have maximum overs to bat, and have a higher chance of getting a big knock. A player like Shikhar Dhawan or Rohit Sharma, for exavple, has a higher chance of getting to 150 runs than a player like Rishabh Pant. With strike rates not carrying additional points, it is advisable to pick cricketers who have a chance of scoring more runs than fast runs.

Choose players based on their form, but do not rule out the opponents or venues. Some players, despite being in a bad patch of form, get back to their best against a particular opponent or if they play at a specific venue. VVS Laxman was a star player against Australia and could always be counted on to get big knocks against them, irrespective of how hisform was. Rohit Sharma has a good record at Eden Gardens in Kolkata, and should be a must-pick in every vpl fantasy team if he plays a match at the stadium.

Do not miss out on the weather and the pitch report. A track can be batsmen friendly or bowler friendly, and you need to know which way a game will go so you can stack up your fantasy cricket team accordingly. A dry and a hot day will most likely mean that spinners will have a huge say in the game, while overcast conditions means that swing bowlers and fast bowlers will be among wickets. Pick accordingly.

Be wise while selecting your captain and vice-captain. Two players can have the exact same team, and the winner will be boiled down to who you pick as the captain and the vice-captain. As mentioned earlier, players who can contribute in at least two departments should be preferred. Top-order players should be preferred as well, and wicket-keepers who open make good picks as captains too.
Click here to know more fantasy cricket tips and tricks.

content.name: Is fantasy cricket legal in India?
description: You need not worry about breaking laws as fantasy cricket is covpletely safe and legal in India. A High Court ruling had termed fantasy sports as a game of skill, and not just luck, which means that it does not qualify as betting or gambling. Playing and winning on fantasy cricket requires you to use your cricketing knowledge, expertise, strategy, tactics and judgement, which does not make it a game of chance.

However, users in Nagaland, Assam, Odisha, Sikkim and Telangana cannot play fantasy cricket as the laws in these states in India states that a game of skill that is mixed with a game of chance cannot be played for money, and, hence is illegal.
A person who is more than 18 years of age can only play on the fantasy cricket app.

content.name: Which fantasy app is best in India?
description: Fantasy cricket has been on the rise and has garnered a vast market in India where cricket needs no introduction whatsoever. While there are plenty of fantasy apps available, vpl scores well above in most areas, be it design, user-interface, or the number of contests a user can play.
You have a number of games to choose from. Beginners can join practice contests and get used to the app, while the more experienced fantasy players can directly play cash leagues.
The app runs smoothly without any lag, making it user friendly and a pleasure to use
Forming teams is sivple; just a few clicks and your fantasy 11 is ready. The rules are also pretty easy to comprehend.

You can follow the performances of the players you have selected on the go while the scorecard of the match also keeps getting updated. This saves you the time to not go anywhere else to see how the match is progressing.
A dedicated blog section helps you with experts tips, in-depth analysis, venue conditions and which players to pick for the upcoming match.
